Title: Prohibits imposition of a sentence of imprisonment without imposition of a fine for DWI offenses
Summary: Requires the court to impose a fine for all alcohol and drug related driving offenses even where a term of imprisonment for such offense is also imposed.
LawCode: Amd ยง1193, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to sentences for alcohol or drug related offenses
